Title: Establishes the permanent child care workforce pay equity fund and provides for the distribution thereof; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the permanent child care workforce pay equity fund and provides for the distribution thereof; makes an appropriation therefor.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the social services law, in relation to establishing a permanent child care workforce pay equity fund and the distribution of such fund; and making an appropriation therefor
